name: Fatigue
description: Feeling unusually tired or weak, commonly caused by deficiencies in iron, Vitamin D, or B12.

name: Hair loss
description: Can be caused by deficiencies in zinc, iron, or biotin, or by taking excessive Vitamin A.

name: Weak immune system
description: A weakened immune system can be a result of a deficiency in Vitamin C, Vitamin D, or zinc.

name: Bone pain or fragility
description: Could be caused by a lack of calcium, Vitamin D, or magnesium.

name: Muscle cramps
description: Often related to deficiencies in potassium, magnesium, or calcium.

name: Irritability or mood swings
description: Can result from low levels of magnesium, Vitamin D, or omega-3 fatty acids.

name: Poor wound healing
description: Can indicate deficiencies in Vitamin C, zinc, or protein.

name: Nausea
description: Could be a symptom of excessive intake of Vitamin A, iron, or Vitamin D.

name: Constipation
description: Often caused by inadequate fiber intake, low magnesium levels, or dehydration.

name: Rash or skin dryness
description: Can be related to deficiencies in omega-3 fatty acids, Vitamin A, or biotin.

name: Headaches
description: Could be caused by a deficiency in magnesium, dehydration, or excess caffeine consumption.

name: Pale skin
description: Can be a sign of iron deficiency, which causes anemia and leads to reduced blood flow.

name: Memory issues or cognitive decline
description: Difficulty concentrating or memory problems can be linked to deficiencies in B vitamins, especially B12, or omega-3 fatty acids.

name: Cravings for certain foods
description: Intense cravings for certain foods (like chocolate or salty snacks) can be a sign of magnesium, iron, or zinc deficiency.

name: Digestive issues (diarrhea, bloating, constipation)
description: A range of digestive issues can arise from deficiencies in magnesium, fiber, or essential fatty acids, or excesses in certain vitamins like Vitamin C or iron.

name: Dark circles under eyes
description: Often a sign of iron deficiency, but could also be related to lack of sleep or dehydration.

name: Increased thirst
description: Excessive thirst can be linked to low levels of sodium, potassium, or magnesium.

name: Edema (swelling)
description: Swelling in the bodyâ€™s tissues, particularly in the feet and ankles, can be caused by deficiencies in protein, potassium, or magnesium.

name: Joint pain
description: Can be caused by deficiencies in Omega-3 fatty acids, Vitamin D, or calcium.

name: Slow or poor circulation
description: Could be linked to Vitamin C deficiency (affecting blood vessel health), or low levels of iron, which affect oxygen transport.

name: Acne or skin inflammation
description: Nutrient deficiencies in zinc, Vitamin A, or Omega-3 fatty acids can contribute to skin issues like acne or inflammation.

name: High blood pressure (Hypertension)
description: This could be a result of excessive intake of sodium or insufficient potassium.

name: Dry or brittle nails
description: This can indicate a deficiency in biotin, zinc, or omega-3 fatty acids.

name: Difficulty breathing
description: Can occur as a result of deficiencies in iron or Vitamin B12, which are necessary for proper oxygen transport in the blood.

name: Swollen or inflamed tongue
description: Can be a symptom of deficiencies in B vitamins, particularly B12, or iron.

name: Bleeding gums
description: This could be a sign of Vitamin C deficiency (scurvy) or Vitamin K deficiency, which is essential for proper blood clotting.

name: Shortness of breath
description: A deficiency in iron or Vitamin B12 can lead to anemia, resulting in shortness of breath.

name: Weakness or muscle fatigue
description: Often linked to deficiencies in potassium, magnesium, or calcium, which are involved in muscle function.

name: Restless Leg Syndrome
description: A condition that causes discomfort and an urge to move the legs, potentially due to deficiencies in iron or magnesium.

name: Lack of appetite
description: This can be a result of deficiencies in zinc or B vitamins (like B12), or an excess of Vitamin A.

name: Irregular heartbeat (arrhythmia)
description: Can occur from potassium, magnesium, or calcium deficiencies, which are essential for normal heart function.

name: Low body temperature
description: Often caused by thyroid issues related to iodine deficiency or a lack of selenium.

name: Slow metabolism
description: Can be a symptom of iodine deficiency, as iodine is crucial for thyroid function and regulating metabolism.
